bug.author: aschernov
bug.summary: CVAT new UI: a problem with Kibana analytics
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>My actions before raising this issue</denchmark-h>
Read/searched the docs Searched past issues
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected Behaviour</denchmark-h>
Kibana analytics must calculate working time <denchmark-h:h3>Current Behaviour</denchmark-h>
Kibana analytics doesn't calculate working_time when a user works in new UI <denchmark-h:h3>Possible Solution</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)</denchmark-h>
Launch any CVAT job in the new UI Make some actions and save the progress Check the working time in Kibana analytics. It'll be 0.00
<denchmark-h:h3>Context</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
Git hash commit (git log -1): Docker version docker version (e.g. Docker 17.0.05): Are you using Docker Swarm or Kubernetes? Operating System and version (e.g. Linux, Windows, MacOS): Code example or link to GitHub repo or gist to reproduce problem: Other diagnostic information / logs:
Logs from `cvat` container
<denchmark-h:h3>Next steps</denchmark-h>
You may <denchmark-link:https://gitter.im/opencv-cvat/public>join our Gitter</denchmark-link> channel for community support.
